alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Hall; Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:03AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Clay, Nance, York, Hamilton, Fillmore, Merrick, southwestern Polk, southeastern Howard and northeastern Hall Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 403 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dannebrog to near Aurora to near Shickley. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Aurora around 410 AM CDT. Geneva, Hampton, Marquette and Grafton around 420 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Palmer, Cushing, Fairmont, McCool Junction, Hordville, Exeter, Polk, Fullerton and Benedict. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 323 and 365. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Fillmore; Hall; Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Polk; York
